block.p: ELEC COMMUNICATIONS CORP., Norwalk, Conn., a local and long-distance provider, said it would acquire the closely held Line One Inc., New York, a telemarketing company, to gain access to the company's marketing and call-center capabilities. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

BON-TON STORES INC., York, Pa., which runs 72 department stores in New York, Pennsylvania and other eastern states, plans to add a unit of Federated Department Stores Inc., Cincinnati, to its sources for its private-label merchandise. Terms of the agreement were not disclosed.

SYMS CORP., Secaucus, N.J., a discount clothing retailer with 47 stores, will buy back as much as 15 percent of its common stock, or about 2.4 million of its 15.9 million shares outstanding, to increase shareholder value.

NEUBERGER BERMAN INC., New York, an investment advisory company, said it planned to acquire Fasciano Co., the investment adviser to the Fasciano Fund, a small-capitalization blend mutual fund. Terms were not disclosed.
